poemsDataJson.list_full: 契(ちぎ)りきな かたみに袖(そで)を しぼりつつ 末(すゑ)の松山(まつやま) 波(なみ)越(こ)さじとは
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Our sleeves were wet with tears//As pledges that our love --//Will last until//Over Sue's Mount of Pines//Ocean waves are breaking.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Chigiriki na|Katami ni sode o|Shibori tsutsu|Sue no Matsu-yama|Nami kosaji to wa
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: すゑのまつやま なみこさしとは
poemsDataJson.author: 清原元輔(きよはらのもとすけ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 約束を守らずに心変わりした女性の不実をなじる心
